frontmatter.title: Introduction to Artificial Neural Network: Part 1
frontmatter.excerpt: The term Neural Network has been used as a buzzword a lot more than anything else in the world of Computer Science, especially during the last couple decades. What exactly is it?

frontmatter.title: Higher-Order Functions in JavaScript
frontmatter.excerpt: If you have been programming in JavaScript for sometimes, chances are you might have used higher order functions somewhere in your code without even realizing it.
